item.title: DJI Offloads Premium Mic Mini Bundle, Now Cheaper Than Budget No-Name Alternatives
item.content:encoded:
Anyone who makes videos or podcasts for a living knows that the impact of audio comes above just about everything else. Seriously, if your sound quality is good enough, then everything else is often secondary, and that’s why having really good microphones is so important. If you’re looking for an amazing option, then you’ll want to get a good lavalier microphone, because they’re a lot more subtle in appearance while providing excellent sound quality.

Right now, Amazon has a deal on which means that the DJI Mic Mini is currently on sale with 38% off, which means it’s down to $74 for a limited time: It’s normally $119, so that’s a decent discount for sure. Not only that, but this comes with two transmitters and one receiver, so you can even use this for duo productions.

See at Amazon

Mic Check

The microphones here are incredibly light, weighing in at only ten grams, which means that you’ll not only be able to connect them to just about any bit of clothing, but also not be weighed down by them. That means you’ll look better on camera, but it also means you can fine-tune the placement to get the perfect sound quality, no matter what environment you’re recording in.

They also feature amazing noise cancelling, with you being able to switch modes as needed. Basic will get rid of standard noises you’d expect, but strong can handle all sorts of sounds. It means that you’ll be getting crystal clear audio at all times, and that’s really important. The microphones have an amazing range of 400m as well, so you can set this up indoors then go outside to record as needed.

The battery life is also very impressive. You can keep these on for up to 10 hours in total, which means that you can record for an entire work day without any problems. That’s plenty of time for a huge number of takes, interviews, or different video or audio ideas as you need. These are small, mighty, and long-lasting microphones that are sure to make you sound better, no matter what you’re using them for.

This is a brilliant discount, but it’s also one that we’re not expecting to last for very long. So, if you do want to enjoy this amazing price tag, we recommend doing so soon. The $74 could run out at any time, and that means time is of the essence if you want to save big and sound good.

item.title: Apple Never Beat Fitbit, and This Fitness Tracker Is 4x Cheaper Than Its Primary Rival
item.content:encoded:
Now that we’re in the last two months of the year, the doors are wide open for all the holiday shopping you need to take care of. If you’re still on the hunt for some gifts for a friend, family member, or loved one, you might want to consider this Fitbit Inspire 3 health and fitness tracker. It’s not even Black Friday yet, but the GPS-enabled wristwatch is already on sale with Black Friday-level prices. It normally sells for $99, but for a limited time you can pick it up on sale for 30% off: Some quick napkin math will tell you that’s a $30 savings, bringing the price you pay to just $69.

See at Amazon

The Fitbit Inspire 3 is you’re own personal trainer right on your wrist, there to help you whether you’re out for a run or grinding through a session in the gym. With over 20 exercise modes to choose from, it automatically kicks into workout tracking when it senses you’re getting active. You can even connect it to your phone’s GPS to track your distance and pace when you’re outside. Want to keep tabs on your stats while lifting, kayaking, or biking? Maybe post to Strava so you can get all your precious kudos? Do it with the Fitbit Inspire 3.

The Inspire 3 monitors your heart rate around the clock and can measure the intensity of your workouts, letting you know when you’re in the fat burn, cardio, or peak zones. This way you can fine-tune your workouts accordingly. Plus, it can help you stay on top of your health by checking for signs of irregular rhythm that could point to atrial fibrillation (AFib). It even tracks things like blood oxygen levels, skin temperature, and more.

Sleep Better, Wake Better

The Fitbit Inspire 3 can gently wake you up with a vibration during your lightest sleep stage, so you start your day feeling refreshed instead of groggy. It also gives you a sleep score and breaks down your light, deep, and REM stages, along with your sleeping heart rate, to help you understand your sleep patterns and improve your habits over time.

Need a little nudge to move more? The Inspire 3 has your back there too. If you’ve been sitting for too long, it’ll send a friendly buzz reminding you to stretch your legs and get moving.

This wristwatch isn’t just to help you tackle physical wellness, but mental wellness too. You can see your daily stress management score, based on factors like heart rate and daily activity, and take guided breathing sessions to help you reset and relax.
